::DarkMouse::

COMPUTER::INTRUDER ALERT! INTRUDER ALERT! AUTOGUNS SET AIM ON 
INTRUDER!

DarkMouse:: "Autoguns set on hold!"
She turned to Megatron and awaited orders as to shoot or not.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::DeathScythe::
> 
> DeathScythe lands near a mountain. His internal repairs have been 
completed, 
> and the assassin transforms into his hideous robot mode. He walks 
into the 
> cave, his scanners picking up bots within.
> 
> He looks around at all the bots and the equipment, making sure to 
stay close 
> to the exit so he can run out if they take this the wrong way.
> 
> "I'm joining. Who're we killing right now?" he asks, looking at the 
biggest 
> bot in the room (Megatron).
